item.title: Jedi: Survivor - How to Clean Fish Tank
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Where To Find The Fish Aquarium
  • How To Clean The Aquarium

Jedi: Survivor is the second game in the Star Wars Jedi franchise ( and a Soulslike game with amazing graphics ). The game follows Cal as he continues to help the Rebels and fight back against the Empire. Taking place five years after the first game, this game offers a ton of new features.

One thing that players can do in this game is help out around Pyloon's Saloon, the establishment that Greez ended up running after the events of the first game. In the saloon, players will find a pretty dirty aquarium. Here's how to clean it up and bring that aquarium back to life.

4:13
Related
Star Wars Jedi: Survivor - Every Lightsaber Stance, Ranked

Every lightsaber stance in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor brings something to the table. Here's how they stack up.

Where To Find The Fish Aquarium

The fish tank, as mentioned above, is inside Pyloon's Saloon. Players will see it behind the bar as soon as they enter the establishment and will probably take note of just how dirty it is. In order to get a better view of it, players can head upstairs and look at it up close. This is also where they can find Skoova Stev, the man in charge of the aquarium.

Related
How Star Wars Jedi: Survivor's Platforming Could Be Even Better in a Sequel

Star Wars Jedi: Survivor has some impressive abilities for players to get around with, but its platforming still has room to grow in a sequel.

How To Clean The Aquarium

Truthfully, the only way that the aquarium can be cleaned is if the player beats the game ( which has a sad ending ). As the story progresses, the tank will slowly become cleaner until it reaches a perfect condition. It seems that while Cal is out saving the universe, Skoova Stev is cleaning the fish tank. Additionally, players can make the tank look even better if they take the time to find all the fish in the game and bring them back to Pyloon's Saloon. The more the story progresses and the more fish that are caught, the better the aquarium will look inside the saloon. Eventually, players will see a perfect aquarium that is full of unique and beautiful fish swimming around.

The player will need to start helping Skoova Stev with collecting fish before they see any changes in the cleanliness of the tank.

Related
Star Wars Jedi: Survivor’s Sequel Needs to Make Good on a Feature Teased by Fallen Order

Star Wars Jedi: Survivor brought a slew of new features and mechanics to the table, but there's one feature that wasn't explored to its full extent.

How To Find Skoova Stev & Fish

Skoova Stev is first encountered in Foothill Falls. When he is first found, he is inside a strange boat and talking about trying to catch fish. After speaking to him for a bit, he agrees to head to Pyloon's Saloon, where he will then be at the aquarium. He won't tell you where to find the 12 fish that are around the game, but he will be in the water near where each one is found. Anytime Skoova Stev is outside the saloon, speak to him to catch some fish.

item.title: Monopoly GO: What Happens to Extra Hammers After Sunken Treasures Ends?
item.description:
Monopoly GO ’s digging minigames bring the thrill of the treasure hunt right to your fingertips. Since they’re a hit with the fans, Scopely frequently releases these dig minigames in addition to their regular schedule of events. The newest addition to the lineup is the exciting Sunken Treasures minigame , where players can use their hammer tokens to dig out lost treasures.

The Sunken Treasures minigame consists of 16 levels and offers tons of rewards, ranging from essentials like dice rolls and cash to rare prizes like the Wild Sticker , an Octopus token, and a Ship’s Wheel shield. Once players reach the final level, there’s a pressing question on their minds: what will happen to their extra tokens once the Sunken Treasures event is over? Read on to find out.

Related
Monopoly GO: Captain’s Quest Rewards and Milestones

Here’s a breakdown of everything you can win by participating in Captain’s Quest, the newest solo event in Monopoly GO.

What Happens To Hammer Tokens Once Sunken Treasures Ends?

The Sunken Treasures digging minigame started on May 23, 2024, and will conclude on May 26, 2024 , giving you four days to collect hammer tokens and dig out the required objects. Since there are multiple ways to collect hammers, you’ll most likely have lots of extra tokens by the time you reach the last milestone.

The idea of letting all of those hard-earned tokens can be upsetting for many players. Thankfully, Monopoly GO features a unique conversion system for all unused tokens in digging events.

As soon as you break the last tile in the final grid, your treasure hunt will be complete and all your extra hammer tokens will be converted into dice rolls at a rate of 3:1 . This means that for each hammer token, you’ll earn three dice . For instance, if you have 30 extra hammers, you will get 90 dice rolls. This conversion system ensures that your leftover tokens still have some value after the Sunken Treasures event is over.

You can use this conversion system in your favor by holding off on completing the last level and stockpiling Hammer tokens to get tons of free dice rolls . You can continue collecting tokens by participating in other events, completing daily quick wins, and claiming free gifts from the shop.

Since dice rolls are an essential resource in Monopoly GO , this conversion system can help you expand your dice pool, ultimately increasing your chances of becoming a wealthy business tycoon.

item.title: WoW MoP Remix: Fastest Ways To Level
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Best Zone Leveling Route In WoW Remix: MoP
  • How To Level Up Quickly In WoW Remix: MoP

World of Warcraft is having an event called World of Warcraft Remix: Mists of Pandaria. In this event, players are able to create a character from the era of the expansion Mists of Pandaria and play it with modern mechanics while working towards rewards like new mounts, pets , toys , or even just transmogs.

With this event, players will only have until August 2024 to create their character and gather whatever they want from the event. Once it ends, the character will be moved to a the retail version of the game. Until then, here's the fastest way to level characters up to level 70 in the remix.

Related
World of Warcraft: 7 Best MoP Remix Addons

There are hundreds, if not thousands, of WoW addons out there – these are the best mods you should get for MoP Remix, specifically.

Best Zone Leveling Route In WoW Remix: MoP

Here is a breakdown of the level routes for each tier of leveling in the game. At certain levels, players will unlock new zones, dungeons, raids, and scenarios . When these are unlocked, players should be sure to utilize them for maximum leveling. The best way to level is to queue up for a dungeon, raid, or scenario and complete zone quests while waiting on those to start up.

Levels

Quest Zones

Dungeons

Raids

Scenarios

Level 10-20

  • The Jade Forest

  • Scarlet Halls
  • Scarlet Monastery
  • Scholomance
  • Temple of the Jade Serpent

  • N/A

  • Greenstone Village
  • Theramore's Fall
  • A Brewing Storm

Level 20-25

  • Valley of the Four Winds
  • Krasarang Wilds

  • All Above
  • Stormstout Brewery

  • N/A

  • All Above
  • A Little Patience
  • Dagger in the Dark
  • Lion's Landing
  • Unga Ingoo

Level 25-30

  • Kun-Lai Summit

  • All Above
  • Shado-Pan Monastery

  • Mogu'shan Vaults

  • All Above
  • Arena of Annihilation
  • Brewmoon Festival
  • Crypt of Forgotten Kings

Level 30-35

  • Townlong Steppes

  • All Above
  • Siege of Niuzao Temple

  • All Above

  • All Above
  • Assault on Zan'vess

Level 35-45

  • All Above

  • All Above
  • Heart of Fear

  • All Above

Level 40-45

  • Isle of Giants
  • Timeless Isle

  • Gate of the Setting Sun
  • Mogu'shan Palace

  • All Above
  • Terrace of Endless Spring

  • All Above
  • Battle on the High Seas
  • Blood in the Snow
  • Dark Heart of Pandaria
  • The Secrets of Ragefire

Level 50-70

  • Isle of Thunder

  • All Above

  • All Above
  • Throne of Thunder
  • Siege of Orgrimmar

  • All Above

Related
WoW MoP Remix: All Reputations & Quartermaster Locations

Though not all MoP reputation Quartermasters are active, and don't sell goods, they still accept Lucky Charms and offer Daily Quests for rep grinding.

How To Level Up Quickly In WoW Remix: MoP

There are several ways that players can level up in the game. Here's a breakdown of them all:

  • Complete zone quests: Each zone in MoP offers players unique storylines. Playing these will allow players to gain experience from killing mobs and completing quests, which is the stereotypical way to level up.
  • Participate in Dungeons: Players can do Dungeons as soon as they start the game, which will allow them to gain more experience than they would with just roaming around and killing monsters in the game.
  • Participate in Raids: Raids will not only give players experience but also better equipment, making leveling up easier than ever.
  • Finish Scenarios: Scenarios are now extremely easy to do since they are on the same menu as looking for Raids and Dungeons, making it a great way to gain experience and level up.
  • Level up the Cloak of Infinite Potential : The better the Cloak of Infinite Potential is, the more experience players will obtain from it.
Related
WoW MoP Remix: How To Get Lesser Charm of Good Fortune

In Mists of Pandaria Remix, Lesser Charms of Good Fortune are useful for building various Pandaria Reputations.

As players upgrade their Cloak, it will also unlock Achievements. These Achievements will allow players' alt characters to start off with better Cloaks, meaning they will level up even faster. This is the best way to ensure that alts level up quickly.
